title: Client update problem!
body: Hi, I am a league of legends player and I'm encountering issues with the game. I took a break from the game and wanted to play the game, the new client update was out 6 months ago so I saw it and started patching. When I was done and came in to the client and wanted to log in I was greeted with the same screen as when I was patching, there was no place to write your info just a picture of "the new client is out" PS: I know about the "delete the LeagueClient.exe" thing but the problem is that I do not have that file in my folder!

replies.body: You'll need to wait for that client update to finish, but if it never properly starts then we may need to adjust a few things. That update needs to have certain [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) in place to run correctly, so double check that guide for steps on how to set those up and let me know if it helps!
